68 /** DMA channel configuration for SPI communication */
69 DMA_CHANNEL_CONFIG_s dma_spiDmaChannels[DMA_NUMBER_SPI_INTERFACES] = {
70  {DMA_CH0, DMA_CH1}, /*!< SPI1 */
71  {DMA_CH2, DMA_CH3}, /*!< SPI2 */
72  {DMA_CH4, DMA_CH5}, /*!< SPI3 */
73  {DMA_CH6, DMA_CH7}, /*!< SPI4 */
74  {DMA_CH8, DMA_CH9}, /*!< SPI5 */
75 };
76 
77 /** DMA request configuration for SPI communication */
78 DMA_REQUEST_CONFIG_s dma_spiDmaRequests[DMA_NUMBER_SPI_INTERFACES] = {
79  {DMA_REQ_LINE_SPI1_TX, DMA_REQ_LINE_SPI1_RX}, /*!< SPI1 */
80  {DMA_REQ_LINE_SPI2_TX, DMA_REQ_LINE_SPI2_RX}, /*!< SPI2 */
81  {DMA_REQ_LINE_SPI3_TX, DMA_REQ_LINE_SPI3_RX}, /*!< SPI3 */
82  {DMA_REQ_LINE_SPI4_TX, DMA_REQ_LINE_SPI4_RX}, /*!< SPI4 */
83  {DMA_REQ_LINE_SPI5_TX, DMA_REQ_LINE_SPI5_RX}, /*!< SPI5 */
84 };
85 
86 /** SPI enumeration for DMA */
87 spiBASE_t *dma_spiInterfaces[DMA_NUMBER_SPI_INTERFACES] = {
88  spiREG1, /*!< SPI1 */
89  spiREG2, /*!< SPI2 */
90  spiREG3, /*!< SPI3 */
91  spiREG4, /*!< SPI4 */
92  spiREG5, /*!< SPI5 */
93 };
